dedication.title: Example Dedication
dedication.simpara: This document is an AsciiDoc book skeleton containing briefly annotated example elements plus a couple of example index entries and footnotes.
Books are normally used to generate DocBook markup and the titles of the preface, appendix, bibliography, glossary and index sections are significant (specialsections).

chapter.title: The First Chapter
chapter.simpara:
Chapters can contain sub-sections nested up to three deep. An example footnote.
